## mapFilterObservablePipe or mapFilter$$$

```ts
function mapFilterObservablePipe<GIn, GOut>(
  mapFunction: IMapFilterMapFunction<GIn, GOut>,
): IObservablePipe<GIn, GOut>
```

Applies a given `mapFunction` function to each value emitted by the source Observable, and emits the resulting values as an Observable if `MAP_FILTER_DISCARD` is not returned.

### Diagram

[![](https://mermaid.ink/img/eyJjb2RlIjoic2VxdWVuY2VEaWFncmFtXG5cbnBhcnRpY2lwYW50IG9ic2VydmFibGVcbnBhcnRpY2lwYW50IG1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlIGFzIG1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlKHggPT4gKHggJSAyID09PSAwKSA_ICh4IC8gMikgOiBNQVBfRklMVEVSX0RJU0NBUkQpXG5wYXJ0aWNpcGFudCBPVVRcblxub2JzZXJ2YWJsZS0-Pm1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlOiAwXG5tYXBGaWx0ZXJPYnNlcnZhYmxlUGlwZS0-Pk9VVDogMFxuXG5vYnNlcnZhYmxlLT4-bWFwRmlsdGVyT2JzZXJ2YWJsZVBpcGU6IDFcblxub2JzZXJ2YWJsZS0-Pm1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlOiAyXG5tYXBGaWx0ZXJPYnNlcnZhYmxlUGlwZS0-Pk9VVDogMVxuXG5vYnNlcnZhYmxlLT4-bWFwRmlsdGVyT2JzZXJ2YWJsZVBpcGU6IDNcblxub2JzZXJ2YWJsZS0-Pm1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlOiA0XG5tYXBGaWx0ZXJPYnNlcnZhYmxlUGlwZS0-)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/edit/#eyJjb2RlIjoic2VxdWVuY2VEaWFncmFtXG5cbnBhcnRpY2lwYW50IG9ic2VydmFibGVcbnBhcnRpY2lwYW50IG1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlIGFzIG1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlKHggPT4gKHggJSAyID09PSAwKSA_ICh4IC8gMikgOiBNQVBfRklMVEVSX0RJU0NBUkQpXG5wYXJ0aWNpcGFudCBPVVRcblxub2JzZXJ2YWJsZS0-Pm1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlOiAwXG5tYXBGaWx0ZXJPYnNlcnZhYmxlUGlwZS0-Pk9VVDogMFxuXG5vYnNlcnZhYmxlLT4-bWFwRmlsdGVyT2JzZXJ2YWJsZVBpcGU6IDFcblxub2JzZXJ2YWJsZS0-Pm1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlOiAyXG5tYXBGaWx0ZXJPYnNlcnZhYmxlUGlwZS0-Pk9VVDogMVxuXG5vYnNlcnZhYmxlLT4-bWFwRmlsdGVyT2JzZXJ2YWJsZVBpcGU6IDNcblxub2JzZXJ2YWJsZS0-Pm1hcEZpbHRlck9ic2VydmFibGVQaXBlOiA0XG5tYXBGaWx0ZXJPYnNlcnZhYmxlUGlwZS0-)

### Examples

#### Emits only the even values, and divide them by 2

```ts
const subscribe = pipeObservable(of(0, 1, 2, 3, 4), [
  mapFilterObservablePipe(x => {
    return (x % 2 === 0) // even
      ? x / 2
      : MAP_FILTER_DISCARD;
  }),
]);

subscribe((value) => {
  console.log(value);
});
```

Output:

```text
0
1
2
```
